# AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.pointSource

**Case**

All channels of the bus render as a single source at the location of the source node.

## Declaration

```swift
case pointSource
```

## Source Modes

- **AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.spatializeIfMono**: A mono input bus that renders as a point source at the location of the source node.
- **AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.bypass**: A mode that does no spatial rendering.
- **AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.ambienceBed**: The input channels spread around the listener as far-field sources that anchor to global space.
